'''''Chill Out!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat [[The Great Snowboar King]] while he is in berserker mode.

==Gameplay Notes==
*Berserker mode is when his eyes glow red and have eye trails.
